title: Ep. 20 - Silent, But Dadly
itunes:title: Ep. 20 - Silent, But Dadly
itunes:subtitle: The dads have won the tournament, and reap their just rewards! Darryl is not okay, Glenn is persuasive, Ron meets a hug, and Henry exhibits a powerful skill...
description:
The dads have won the tournament, and reap their just rewards! Darryl is not okay, Glenn is persuasive, Ron meets a hug, and Henry exhibits a powerful skill...


This episode contains profanity, references to self-harm/suicide, and body horror.


Support the show on Patreon!

Get merch and more at our website!

Follow us on Twitter @dungeonsanddads!

Join our Facebook group!

Check out the subreddit!

Project DADGUT is the group transcription project


DM is Anthony Burch

Darryl Wilson is Matt Arnold (@mattlarnold)

Henry Oak is Will Campos (@willbcampos)

Ron Stampler is Beth May (@heybethmay)

Glenn Close is Freddie Wong (@fwong)


Theme song by Maxton Waller

Cover art by Alex Moore (@notanotheralex)


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
